snippet: Senator Harry Reid of Nevada, the minority leader, on Twitter: “When Trump insulted a G.O.P. senator, Republicans couldn’t denounce him fast enough. But when Trump slandered immigrants, there was silence.”
abstract: Senator Harry Reid of Nevada, the minority leader, on Twitter: “When Trump insulted a G.O.P. senator, Republicans couldn’t denounce him fast enough. But when Trump slandered immigrants, there was silence.”

headline.main: Verbatim: Harry Reid Scolds Republicans on Donald Trump
